title: Versatile Full-Stack Web Developer & Designer
description: Detail-oriented Web Developer with nearly 5 years of hands-on experience specializing in both Front-End and Back-End development, including UI/UX design and server management. Proven track record in deploying live applications and driving their market presence, demonstrating a keen understanding of the complete development lifecycle.

I'm passionate about creating clean, efficient code and intuitive user experiences. My expertise spans from crafting visually appealing interfaces to implementing robust back-end systems and managing server infrastructure.
